title: Occurrence of aflatoxin M1 in cheese products commonly available in Sri Lankan market
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Asanka Mudannayake, Sachini Karunarathne, Pasindu W. Jayasooriya, Diani Nanayakkara, Ayesh Abesooriya, Susil Silva, Ruchika Fernando
